data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 16,670 believers in Hajdú-Bihar to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hajdú-Bihar, Hungary
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Hajdú-Bihar, Hungary to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 545,600 souls living in the state of Hajdú-Bihar with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Hajdú-Bihar that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Hajdú-Bihar, Hungary.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Hajdú-Bihar, Hungary.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Hajdú-Bihar to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
